verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> in the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2228>Zerahiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1231>Bukki,<s%>

the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H50>Abishua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

this <S%H5830>man<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> and he was a <S%H4106>ready<s%> <S%H5608>scribe<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> had <S%H5414>given;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> him all his <S%H1246>request,<s%> according to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his God on <S%H430>him.<s%>

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> some of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> and the <S%H5411>Nethinim,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> in the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
He <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which was in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

For on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3246>began<s%> he to go <S%H4609>up<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> he to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> according to the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his God on <S%H430>him.<s%>

For <S%H5830>he<s%> had <S%H3559>set<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3925>it,<s%> and to teach in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>

Now this is the <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H5406>letter<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> even the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and of his <S%H2706>statutes<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

<S%H783>Artaxerxes,<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H4430>kings,<s%> to <S%H5831>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3549>priest,<s%> the <S%H5613>scribe<s%> of the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> <S%H1585>perfect<s%> and so <S%H3706>forth.<s%>

<S%H4481>I<s%> <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> that <S%H3606>all<s%> those <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H5972>people<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> and their <S%H3549>priests<s%> and the <S%H3879>Levites,<s%> in my <S%H4437>realm,<s%> who are minded of their own free <S%H5069>will<s%> to go <S%H1946>to<s%> <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1946>go<s%> with <S%H5974>you.<s%>

<S%H1768>Because<s%> you <S%H3606>are<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H3272>counselors,<s%> to <S%H1240>inquire<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> according to the <S%H1882>law<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> which is in your <S%H3028>hand,<s%>

and to <S%H2987>carry<s%> the <S%H3702>silver<s%> and <S%H1722>gold,<s%> which the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H3272>counselors<s%> have freely <S%H5069>offered<s%> to the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H4907>habitation<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%>

and <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H3702>silver<s%> and <S%H1722>gold<s%> that you shall <S%H7912>find<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the freewill <S%H5069>offering<s%> of the <S%H5972>people,<s%> and of the <S%H3549>priests,<s%> offering <S%H5069>willingly<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of their <S%H426>God<s%> which is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%>

<S%H3606>therefore<s%> you shall with all <S%H629>diligence<s%> <S%H7066>buy<s%> with <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3702>money<s%> <S%H8450>bulls,<s%> <S%H1798>rams,<s%> <S%H563>lambs,<s%> with their meal <S%H4504>offerings<s%> and their drink <S%H5261>offerings,<s%> and shall <S%H7127>offer<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> the <S%H4056>altar<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> which is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H4101>Whatever<s%> shall seem <S%H3191>good<s%> to you and <S%H5922>to<s%> your <S%H252>brothers<s%> to <S%H5648>do<s%> with the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H3702>silver<s%> and the <S%H1722>gold,<s%> <S%H5648>do<s%> that after the <S%H7470>will<s%> of your <S%H426>God.<s%>

The <S%H3984>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3052>given<s%> to you for the <S%H6402>service<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H8000>deliver<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%>

Whatever <S%H7606>more<s%> shall be <S%H2819>needful<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God,<s%> which you shall have <S%H5308>occasion<s%> to <S%H5415>bestow,<s%> <S%H5415>bestow<s%> it out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H1596>treasure<s%> <S%H1005>house.<s%>

<S%H4481>I,<s%> even <S%H4481>I<s%> <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> do <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H1490>treasurers<s%> who are <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> that whatever <S%H5831>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3549>priest,<s%> the <S%H5613>scribe<s%> of the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> shall <S%H7593>require<s%> of <S%H5648>you,<s%> it be done with all <S%H629>diligence,<s%>

<S%H5705>to<s%> one <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H3604>talents<s%> of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> and to one <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H2591>wheat,<s%> and to one <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H1325>baths<s%> of <S%H2562>wine,<s%> and to one <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H1325>baths<s%> of <S%H4887>oil,<s%> and <S%H4416>salt<s%> <S%H3809>without<s%> prescribing how <S%H3792>much.<s%>

<S%H3606>Whatever<s%> is commanded <S%H2941>by<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> let it be <S%H5648>done<s%> <S%H149>exactly<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven;<s%> <S%H1768>for<s%> <S%H4101>why<s%> should there <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H7109>wrath<s%> <S%H5922>against<s%> the <S%H4437>realm<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H1123>sons?<s%>

Also we <S%H3046>inform<s%> <S%H3606>you,<s%> that touching any of the <S%H3549>priests<s%> and <S%H3879>Levites,<s%> the <S%H2171>singers,<s%> <S%H8652>porters,<s%> <S%H5412>Nethinim,<s%> or <S%H6399>servants<s%> of <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> it shall <S%H3809>not<s%> be <S%H7990>lawful<s%> to <S%H7412>impose<s%> <S%H1093>tribute,<s%> <S%H1983>custom,<s%> or <S%H4061>toll,<s%> on <S%H5922>them.<s%>

<S%H607>You,<s%> <S%H5831>Ezra,<s%> after the <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> who is in your <S%H3028>hand,<s%> <S%H4483>appoint<s%> <S%H8200>magistrates<s%> and <S%H1782>judges,<s%> who may <S%H1934>judge<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>people<s%> who are <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> such as <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H1882>laws<s%> of your <S%H426>God;<s%> and <S%H3046>teach<s%> him who <S%H3809>doesn't<s%> know <S%H3046>them.<s%>

<S%H3606>Whoever<s%> will <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1934>do<s%> the <S%H1882>law<s%> of your <S%H426>God,<s%> and the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H4430>king,<s%> let <S%H1780>judgment<s%> <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H5648>executed<s%> on <S%H4481>him<s%> with all <S%H629>diligence,<s%> <S%H2006>whether<s%> it be to <S%H4193>death,<s%> <S%H2006>or<s%> to <S%H8332>banishment,<s%> <S%H2006>or<s%> to <S%H6065>confiscation<s%> of <S%H5232>goods,<s%> or to <S%H613>imprisonment.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> who has <S%H5414>put<s%> such a thing as this in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and has <S%H5186>extended<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to me <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and his <S%H3289>counselors,<s%> and before all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H8269>princes.<s%> I was <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> according to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> on <S%H6908>me,<s%> and I gathered together out of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> chief <S%H7218>men<s%> to go up with <S%H5927>me.<s%>
